spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you Elemental Whirl, increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Versatility by 238 for 10 sec.
Spending Holy Power during Crusade causes you to explode with Holy light for 397 damage per Holy Power spent to nearby enemies. Crusade's duration is increased by 5 sec.
While Crusade is active, your Mastery is increased by 577.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Crusade for 35% of its base duration.

When the Vision of Perfection activates, you and up to 2 other nearby allies gain 4 Haste for 10 sec.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Reduces the cooldown of Crusade by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Crusade, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Holy Power spent on them, heal you for 107, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 5%, and when you move more than 25 yds within 4 sec, gain 8 Strength for 20 sec.

This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Your critical strikes with spells and abilities grant a stack of Blood-Soaked, increasing Critical Strike by 1. Upon reaching 40 stacks, you gain 22 Haste for 8 sec.

Blood-Soaked has a 25% chance of only consuming 30 stacks.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Increases your Versatility by 61 and your Speed by 30.
While Crusade is active, your Mastery is increased by 494.
Your attacks have a chance to make your next Divine Storm free and deal 1,015 additional damage.

Aureate Sentry's Roaring Will

spells.description: Equip: Show off your truly epic brawling accomplishments.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.

Your attacks have a chance to make your next Divine Storm free and deal 2,462 additional damage.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

sockets.display_string: +136 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 3,808 or your lowest secondary stat by 4,804 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 5,111 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 750 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
